mapper.select: SELECT eq_code , eq_mdnm , use , eq_mdno , eq_dep , eq_temp , eq_min , eq_max , eq_standtemp , eq_period , manager , eq_location , eq_img , line_code , eq_type , eq_name , eq_ckdate , description , user_id FROM eq ORDER BY eq_code
SELECT eq_mdnm , eq_mdno , eq_ckdate , use , eq_dep , manager , eq_period , eq_img , eq_code , eq_standtemp , eq_location , line_code FROM eq WHERE eq_code = #{eqCode}
SELECT eq_code , eq_type , eq_name , eq_period , use FROM eq ORDER BY eq_code

SELECT ec.eq_chck_opcd , ec.eq_code , ec.eq_nextchck , ec.eq_chckox , ec.start_date , ec.end_date , ec.reason , ec.comm , e.eq_name FROM eq_chck ec join eq e on ec.eq_code = e.eq_code ORDER BY eq_code
SELECT e.eq_code , e.eq_period , e.eq_ckdate , ec.eq_nextchck , ec.eq_chckox FROM eq e JOIN eq_chck ec ON e.eq_code = ec.eq_code ORDER BY eq_code
mapper.insert:
select case when (max(substr(eq_chck_opcd, 2, 8))) = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd') then ('O' || to_char(max(substr(eq_chck_opcd, 2, 13)) + 1)) else ('O' || to_char(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd') || to_char(lpad(1, 4, 0)) ) end eq_chck_opcd from eq_chck
INSERT INTO eq_chck ( eq_chck_opcd , eq_code , reason , start_date , end_date) VALUES ( #{eqChckOpcd} , #{eqCode} , #{reason} , #{startDate} , #{endDate})
